main event: An observer in Dayton, Ohio saw one unidentified phenomenon with blinking red and white lights on 7 December 1968.
interesting points: The lights seemed to switch colors every 2 seconds., The sighting lasted for approximately 25 seconds., The observer reported the lights appearing solid and glowing with a pulsating light., The phenomenon was witnessed while the observer was outdoors heading towards a friend's house., The conclusion of the report suggests the observed phenomenon was probably an aircraft.
sighted object: one unidentified phenomenon with blinking lights
witness description: A civilian who was outdoors and has a noted experience with flying lessons.
